item.description:
Join Helene Olsen as you participate in an interactive presentation about the Angelic Realm. Her talk includes channeled energy and a short reading for each group member! Each participant will receive an Angel token.

Helene is a Psychic Medium who delivers all messages in Love and Light. She is able to clearly communicate with both the Angelic Realm and the Spirit realm. Each connection is more proof to her that Love never dies and that Love is the most Powerful energy in the Universes. Helene has the ability to both "see" and "hear" the Angelic and Spirit realm. Her ability to communicate with other realms allows her to relay unexpected information to you.


Find Helene at www.AngelsLighthouse.com

$25 pre-paid, $30 at the door

Please note that you need to pay in advance to take advantage of a discounted rate. You can pay online at http://schedule.eternal-balance.com/schedule/Eternal-Balance/Eternal_Balance/1264908, you can call Olga at (781) 864-7076 and pay with a credit card over the phone, or you can mail a check to Eternal Balance.
item.how_to_find_us: Please check directions at www.eternal-balance.com if you haven't been to the studio yet. It's easy to get lost in building 100.
item.why: Helene is wonderful! She is also doing a show on Medford TV, you can check out a preview here: http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=190386067666563&pending#!/video/video.php?v=1815872633050&comments Helene is the one with the cute socks!
item.name: An Evening With Your Angels
